scriptedEmail.name: Idea Status Notifications
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to subscribed users of an Idea when the status is changed.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
$core_v2_language.FormatNumber($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.TotalVotes)

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Votes')

$context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Status.Name
#if ($context_v1_email.Context.IdeaStatusNotificationInformation.DidStatusChange)

#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_StatusChanged')) #token('status_author_link') #set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.Url) #if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.DisplayName #end #token('status') $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Status.Name #token('idea_name_link') $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Name #end

#elseif ($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Note('Web').Length > 0) #format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_StatusNote')) #token('status_author_link') #set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.Url) #if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Author.DisplayName #end #token('status') $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Status.Name #token('idea_name_link') $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Name #end #end $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.CurrentStatus.Note('Web')
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_StatusChanged">{status_author_link} changed the status of {idea_name_link} to {status}.</resource> <resource name="Body_StatusNote">{status_author_link} added a status note on {idea_name_link}:</resource> <resource name="Body_Votes">vote(s)</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this email because the status on an Idea you are subscribed to was changed. You can disable these notifications {settings_link}.</resource> <resource name="Settings">here</resource> <resource name="Subject">{status_author} updated the status on {idea_name}</resource> <resource name="Header">{status_author} updated the status on {idea_name}</resource> </language>
